sentences.en: ...a new social class composed largely of war profiteers and gangsters.
sentences.cn: ...主要由战争投机商和强盗组成的一个新的社会阶层。

sentences.en: He tried to profiteer from this dirty deal.
sentences.cn: 他想在这笔肮脏的交易中捞一把.

sentences.en: If can play game already, can profiteer again, it is good to should have many so!
sentences.cn: 要是既能玩游戏, 又能赚大钱, 这样该有多好 啊 !

sentences.en: If the air is recalculated in e . g. the food industry a profiteer can be used.
sentences.cn: 如果空气是再循环的,比如食品工业,可以用低效的前置过滤器.

sentences.en: Other side, sport itself is the main profiteer owing to the sport's charitable and public feature.
sentences.cn: 另一方面,由于体育具有公益性和全民性的特点, 体育本身也成为发行彩票的主要受益者.

sentences.en: Schindler: I'm a profiteer of slave labor. I am a criminal.
sentences.cn: 辛德勒: 我是唯一的雇佣奴工的投机商人, 我目前已成了一名罪犯.

sentences.en: Shi Ba is a self - employed profiteer, skilled in deceiving, bragging, speculating and playing.
sentences.cn: 石岜是个个体户“倒爷”,搓 、 蹭 、 侃 、 倒、玩样样在行.

sentences.en: You have called me a Iiar and a thief and a war profiteer!
sentences.cn: 你说我是个骗子,小偷,发战争财!

trans.tran_cn: [贸易] 奸商，牟取暴利的人
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as a profiteer, you are critical of them because they make large profits by charging high prices for goods that are hard to get
